mapper.select:
select t.*, f102.id contrastId,devicetype.SHOWVALUE deviceType, deviceclass.SHOWVALUE deviceClass, CASE WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='赠送合同' THEN '06' WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='备货合同' THEN '07' WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='试用合同' THEN '04' WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='退货合同' THEN '04' ELSE '01' END stCode,f102.field0056,f102.field0057,per.name createUser, f102.field0013 deviceName,f102.field0014 deviceStd,f102.field0058 remark from ( select t.field0108 start_date,t.ID,t.field0160 personName,t.field0003,t.field0006,t.field0018,t.field0019,t.field0020,t.field0021,t.field0022,t.field0023, t1.field0007,t1.field0008,t1.field0009,t1.field0010,t1.field0011,t1.field0012,t1.field0013,t1.formmain_id,t1.field0123,t1.field0103 from ${database}.dbo.formmain_0130 t left join ${database}.dbo.formson_0131 t1 on t.id=t1.formmain_id )t
left join ${database}.dbo.formmain_0110 f102 on f102.field0001=t.field0006 and f102.field0002=t.field0007
left join ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM httype on f102.field0006=httype.id left join ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM deviceclass on deviceclass.id=f102.field0048 left join ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM devicetype on devicetype.id=f102.field0049 LEFT JOIN ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM i ON i.id = f102.field0054
left join ${database}.dbo.ORG_MEMBER per on f102.field0059=per.id where COALESCE(f102.field0033,'')='' and httype.SHOWVALUE='商务合同' and f102.field0001 not in (select field0001 from ${database}.dbo.view_u8so_begin)

select t.*, f111.id contrastId,f102.id contrastMainId,f111.field0063 design_user, devicetype.SHOWVALUE deviceType,deviceclass.SHOWVALUE deviceClass, CASE WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='赠送合同' THEN '06' WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='备货合同' THEN '07' WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='试用合同' THEN '04' WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='退货合同' THEN '04' ELSE '01' END stCode,f102.field0056,f102.field0057,per.name createUser, f102.field0013 deviceName,f102.field0014 deviceStd,f102.field0058 remark from ( select t.field0108 start_date,t.ID,t.field0160 personName,t.field0003,t.field0006,t.field0018,t.field0019,t.field0020,t.field0021,t.field0022,t.field0023, t1.field0007,t1.field0008,t1.field0009,t1.field0010,t1.field0011,t1.field0012,t1.field0013,t1.formmain_id,t1.field0123,t1.field0103 from ${database}.dbo.formmain_0130 t left join ${database}.dbo.formson_0131 t1 on t.id=t1.formmain_id )t
left join ${database}.dbo.formmain_0110 f102 on f102.field0001=t.field0006 and f102.field0002=t.field0007 left join ${database}.dbo.formson_0111 f111 on f102.id=f111.formmain_id left join ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM httype on f102.field0006=httype.id left join ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM deviceclass on deviceclass.id=f102.field0048 left join ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM devicetype on devicetype.id=f102.field0049 LEFT JOIN ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM i ON i.id = f102.field0054 left join ${database}.dbo.ORG_MEMBER per on f102.field0059=per.id where COALESCE(f111.field0046,'')='' and COALESCE(f111.field0018,'')!='' and COALESCE(f111.field0021,0)!=0 and httype.SHOWVALUE='商务合同' and f102.field0001 not in (select field0001 from ${database}.dbo.view_u8so_begin)

select t.*, f111.id contrastId,f102.id contrastMainId,f111.field0063 design_user, devicetype.SHOWVALUE deviceType,deviceclass.SHOWVALUE deviceClass, CASE WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='赠送合同' THEN '06' WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='备货合同' THEN '07' WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='试用合同' THEN '04' WHEN COALESCE(i.SHOWVALUE,'')='退货合同' THEN '04' ELSE '01' END stCode,f102.field0056,f102.field0057,per.name createUser, f102.field0013 deviceName,f102.field0014 deviceStd,f102.field0058 remark from ( select t.field0108 start_date,t.ID,t.field0160 personName,t.field0003,t.field0006,t.field0018,t.field0019,t.field0020,t.field0021,t.field0022,t.field0023, t1.field0007,t1.field0008,t1.field0009,t1.field0010,t1.field0011,t1.field0012,t1.field0013,t1.formmain_id,t1.field0123,t1.field0103 from ${database}.dbo.formmain_0130 t left join ${database}.dbo.formson_0131 t1 on t.id=t1.formmain_id )t
left join ${database}.dbo.formmain_0110 f102 on f102.field0001=t.field0006 and f102.field0002=t.field0007 left join ${database}.dbo.formson_0111 f111 on f102.id=f111.formmain_id left join ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM httype on f102.field0006=httype.id left join ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM deviceclass on deviceclass.id=f102.field0048 left join ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM devicetype on devicetype.id=f102.field0049 LEFT JOIN ${database}.dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM i ON i.id = f102.field0054 left join ${database}.dbo.ORG_MEMBER per on f102.field0059=per.id where COALESCE(f111.field0046,'')!='' and COALESCE(f111.field0018,'')!='' and COALESCE(f111.field0021,0)!=0 and httype.SHOWVALUE='商务合同' and f111.id in (select COALESCE(id,'') from ${database}.dbo.view_so_edit)
